issue.message: Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead

This call is to a method from API 19, the call containing class androidx.media2.test.common.TestUtils is not annotated with @RequiresApi(x) where x is at least 19. Either annotate the containing class with at least @RequiresApi(19) or move the call to a static method in a wrapper class annotated with at least @RequiresApi(19).
